slides.title: Ranking
slides.content:
**From top:** Position counting from top
**From bottom:** Position from bottom
**Formula:** Total = Top + Bottom - 1
**Between:** Positions in middle

slides.title: Example
slides.content:
**A is 5th from top, 10th from bottom**
Total = 5 + 10 - 1 = 14 students

**Between A and B:** Total - (A+B)
